reviewText: I saw the last half of this episode and I wanted to see the first part, I saw that amazon had it on their list of episodes to buy so I took a chance and bought it this was the first time I every bought an episode of any show on Amazon and everything worked out just fine and I am happy with this purchase!

reviewText: I love Julia in anything.  She's incredible comedic actress.  The supporting cast is great too.  Even at my lowest, this show can make me laugh.
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: This is honestly one of the best situation comedy series of recent years.Julia Louis Dreyfus is one of he all-time funniest female comic actorsin the history of the medium. She shines beyond Seinfeld here.A couple of misguided customers gave this set a single star becauseof technical problems they had with delivery/product and not the actualprograms. It really doesn't make sense to do that on Amazon. You aresupposed to rate the actual program being sold here and not complain ifyour shipment was damaged, which has nothing to do with rating the show.
summary: TERRIFIC CAST, TERRIFIC WRITING = TERRIFIC SHOW
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: This show is very funny with new christine in hilarious situations. Characters are really funny and it makes for a good show. It is a show you watch no matter which episode is on.
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: I'm sad to say that i only found out about this show due to the fact that lifetime is now playing reruns of it. I loved what shows i saw so i decided to buy the seasons on dvd. The new adventures of old Christine is hilarious. I really wish the network that ran the show would have advertised a lot more and then maybe it wouldn't have been canceled. I would recommend this comedy to anyone who loves to laugh. I'm anxiously waiting for seasons 4 and 5 to come out on dvd!
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: I loved this show but again full price for a partial season (My Boys final season only has 9 eps)?  I will be searching for better prices (pssst...the WBstore has it for $10 less).  Why not bundle seasons 3 & 4 and leave the final season of Christine to stand alone (it wasn't as good anyway)  Still I wish the show hadn't been canceled, because Eric McCormack was awesome.
summary: Yea!!! Love the show...not the price
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: The show is doing pretty well, now in its 5th season. I just don't understand why the studio refuses to release seasons 3 and 4 on DVD or iTunes!
summary: When is this going to be released???
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: This TV show is so very funny. It is a family show that you can all watch together. The prices on Amazon .com are always great and the DVD was new and as advertized in the package. The shipping is always very fast. Buy this DVD and you will enjoy the show anytime you want to put it in your DVD player.
summary: The New Adventures of Old Christine Season Three on DVD
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: The New Adventures of Old Christine's Season 3 deserves 5-stars, but I gave it two because of so few episodes.Two DVD's, 10 episodes. Regular price, 34.99, on sale 24.99.What I'd like to know is the actual cost in the making of a DVD.Season 3's episodes are well-written, well-acted and hilarious.I love Julia-Louis Dreyfus. She's one of the funniest comedians of the 21st century. A newer version of Lucille Ball.The remaining cast members are excellent actors, too.Each character does a fantastic job, well-suited to their roles, in a family-type atmosphere.I recommend buying Season 3 especially if you're a die-hard Julia/Elaine/Christine fan..Prepare youself to watch the complete season at one sitting. Buy a smaller bag of popcorn. lol. Toni
summary: New Christine, Old Christine: The Complete Third Season
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season

reviewText: The ten episodes are very good, but because of the writer's strike during that year every show on tv was shortened in episodes.  I still enjoy the first two seasons of this show the most, but each season has some really funny scenes and episodes.
summary: Good, but only ten episodes because of writer's strike
Title: The New Adventures of Old Christine: The Complete Third Season
